title: Blueprint, "International Casino: Table Inlay", July 9, 1937
medium: Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper, double ruled border
markings: Stamp at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed at lower left: DESIGN FOR TABLE INLAY/SHOWING VARIOUS SIZES; below in red color pencil: SEE SCHEDULE FOR COLORS; Inscribed in stamp: 546-79; 3"=1'-0"; INT. CASINO; SAENGER / E[?]W/DC[overlapping] / 7/9/37; 7/9 3 BRECKER / 7/9 3 office; center in red color pencil: POL. ALUMINUM/INLAY; inscribed with dimensions
description: Design for polished aluminum inlay; abstracted guitar at left leaning against cocktail glass holding an olive. Design at center of table, intended for various sized tables.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "International Casino: Table Inlay", July 9, 1937.
July 9, 1937. Blueprint and red color pencil on white wove paper, double ruled border. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-214.
